eligibility: Persons of Okpella origin or descent
Individuals with strong interest in and commitment to Okpella culture and community development goals

application.description: Non-refundable application fee for new members

single.description: Annual membership dues for single members

married.description: Annual membership dues for married couples

benefits: Voting rights in General Assembly (when in good standing)
Access to member-only events and meetings
Opportunity to serve on committees and leadership positions
Network with Okpella community members across USA and Canada
Direct involvement in community development projects

requirements: Adherence to organizational bylaws and code of conduct
privileges: Access to welfare assistance programs if needed

categories.description: Okpella indigenes and descendants with full membership privileges
Spouses and individuals with strong commitment to Okpella development
